Class ec.cosm.costume.AnimationFrame 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.cosm.costume.AnimationFrame
public class AnimationFrame
extends Object
implements RtCodeable
Class AnimationFrame specifies one frame of a motion-and-sound sequence that can be performed by an avatar or other in-world object. AnimationFrames are collected into ordered lists by class Animation.

soundURL
Where to locate the sound that begins on this frame of the animation.

AnimationFrame()

classNameToEncode(RtEncoder)
decode(RtDecoder)
encode(RtEncoder)
getPositionName()
setPositionName(String)

soundURL 
  public String soundURL
Where to locate the sound that begins on this frame of the animation. This is most often null.
